title: New study materials are available
noticeMessage:
6 lessons added to the curated collection:
 - [weak self] (Intermediate)
 - @escaping closures (Intermediate)
 - Download images with @escaping, Combine and Async/Await (Intermediate)
 - Struct vs Class vs Actor, Value vs Reference Types, Stack vs Heap (Intermediate)
 - Protocols (Advanced)
 - Dependency Injection (Advanced)

title: New App update 1.2.1(3) is available
noticeMessage:
- Added an 'Original' sorting option to the filter to view materials in their default order
- Improved overall performance
- Various UX enhancements

title: New study materials are available
noticeMessage:
Two new courses added to the curated collection:
 - SwiftUI Continued Learning (Intermediate)
- Swift Concurrency (Intermediate)

title: New App update 1.1.2(2) is available
noticeMessage:
